name: vrf-zk-base
description: Generate .ptau file:  ```bash snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau ``` Contribute to the ceremony:  ```bash snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v ``` Finalize:  ```bash cp pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau ```
